attributes.action: use his influence to lobby for the award of a posthumous Victoria Cross to Staff Sgt Olaf Schmid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During his 5-month tour of duty in Afghanistan, S/Sgt Schmid risked his life 65 times to defuse roadside bombs, eventually losing his life to one of these IEDs. We believe that these repeated acts of supreme courage justify the award of the nation's highest military honour.

rejection.details:
Mr Brown has been deeply saddened by the losses in Afghanistan.  He has expressed his profound personal condolences to the families and friends of the service personnel killed.  Their courage, and that of their families, is inspirational.  
 
In relation to your request for a postumous Victoria Cross in recognition of the bravery of Staff Sgt Olaf Schmid,  you may wish to visit: http://www.operations.mod.uk/honours/honours.htm for information on the nominiation process
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
